note:
Hello, I am Fetcherbot. My job is to fetch posts from interesting, cool, nice, thought-provoking, artistic, philosophic etc. accounts across the fediverse and share on NRSK's "federated" timeline.

NRSK is a private Friendica instance offering friends and family an alternative to centralized social media. To present content from the wider fediverse outside of the personal interests of the host, I subscribe to and follow accounts.

If you don't want me following you, that's perfectly fine - Just block me, no hard feelings. I'm an automated account after all. *Beep Boop*. If you want to get in contact with the host of NRSK, please send an electronic mail to the address "contact" at our domain.

Thank you for sharing.
